DataHubExecutionRequestInput.description:
An request to execution some remote logic or action.
TODO: Determine who is responsible for emitting execution request success or failure. Executor?

task.description: The name of the task to execute, for example RUN_INGEST

executorId.description: Advanced: specify a specific executor to route the request to. If none is provided, a "default" executor is used.

source.description: Source which created the execution request

requestedAt.description: Time at which the execution request input was created

actorUrn.description: Urn of the actor who created this execution request.

type.description: The type of the execution request source, e.g. INGESTION_SOURCE

ingestionSource.description: The urn of the ingestion source associated with the ingestion request. Present if type is INGESTION_SOURCE
